original_title: 15 containers of medicine held at the port
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Secretary to the Ministry of Health Dr. Palitha Mahipala said 15 containers of imported medicines are currently held at the port.
The Health Secretary said the stock of medicine was imported by the private sector.
The Health Secretary added that they did not get clearance due to several issues including the registration of the relevant pharmaceutical companies.
Dr. Palitha Mahipala said a committee was appointed to look into the issue.
The committee reportedly includes officials from the National Medicines Regulatory Authority, the State Pharmaceuticals Corporation, the Medical Supplies Division, and the Ministry of Health.
